code: const initState={isLoading:false};export const loadingReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'CHANGE_LOADING':return{...state,isLoading:action.isLoading};default:return state;}};export const loadingAC=isLoading=>({type:'CHANGE_LOADING',isLoading});
